mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account( account_id, account_pw, account_state, account_level, account_createdate, account_updatedate ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, PASSWORD(#{accountPw}), #{accountState}, #{accountLevel}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO student_queue( student_id, student_email, student_name, student_phone, student_gender, student_birth, student_address_main, student_address_sub ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{studentEmail}, #{studentName}, #{studentPhone}, #{studentGender}, #{studentBirth}, #{studentAddressMain}, #{studentAddressSub} )

INSERT INTO teacher_queue( teacher_id, teacher_email, teacher_name, teacher_phone, teacher_gender, teacher_birth, teacher_address_main, teacher_address_sub ) VALUES ( #{teacherId}, #{teacherEmail}, #{teacherName}, #{teacherPhone}, #{teacherGender}, #{teacherBirth}, #{teacherAddressMain}, #{teacherAddressSub} )
